creditline: Gift of Janet H. Spokes in memory of her parents, Angelica and Ignatius Houley
description: heavy-set man wearing a brown jacket and grey striped pants, with his PR hand inside his vest, seated on a balcony, with three clamps holding his head in place while a standing photographer behind his black cloth takes the man's picture
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

at bottom edge, in pencil: untranslated inscription in French
portfolio: From Les Bons Bourgeois, from Charivari July 24, 1847
signed: LRQ in the print, in black: [h.D.]
title: Position réputée la plus commode pour avoir un joli portrait au Daguerréotype. (Les Bons Bourgeois No. 49), from Le Charivari
